description: Supports a wide range of prefix commands
Bunch of slash commands are avaliable with easy to use syntax
Set Afk command is avaliable with easy to use syntax.
Logs all moderation actions (vc-log, message-delete, join-log etc.) in a channel.
Customizable welcome messages for new members.
Extra features like purge, av, embed and many more
Pull your direct social updates directly to your server.
